attributes.review: Downloaded it and it wouldn’t stop glitching... kept telling my to vote for Trump... The app is clearly broken! Why would I support a racist ass, a homophobic or a SEXUAL PREDATOR?? Also when is someone gonna tell him orange is not his color??

attributes.review: This app was supposed to give me reasons to vote for trump or buy merch the clothes are ugly no reason what so ever to vote for trump he just seems like a racist homophobic transphobic person with 46 different rape accusations I am not pleased with this app
